subject: Re: [junit] Comparison to JavaTest?
msgSnippet: ... Hmmm.... I thought Sun scrapped that product a while back, but I could be wrong. Mike -- Mike Clark Clarkware Consulting, Inc. Custom Software
messageBody:
Richard Jensen wrote:

> I'm trying to get a team to use JUnit to do automated unit testing.
> One of our members referenced 'JavaTest' from Sun and gave me a .pdf
> document (~180 pages) with a description of it. I went to
> java.sun.com to see if I could find anything else about it but came
> up empty.
>
> Has anyone compared JUnit with JavaTest?
>

Hmmm.... I thought Sun scrapped that product a while back, but I could be
wrong.

Mike

--
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
Custom Software Architecture, Design,
Development, and Performance Consulting
